EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-09-28
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Ecosystem and Steeltoe 1.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 28, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-partner-ecosystem-shows-strong-momentum?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Partner Ecosystem Shows Strong Momentum We’re proud to announce that over 100 global and regional systems integrators and consultancies have joined us on our mission to transform how the world builds software. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/pivotal-partner-ecosystem-shows-strong-momentum?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/steeltoe-1-1-and-the-net-cloud-native-renaissance?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Steeltoe 1.1 and The .NET Cloud-Native Renaissance Zach Brown explains Steeltoe and why right now is a great time to be a .NET developer. Join the .NET Revolution <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/steeltoe-1-1-and-the-net-cloud-native-renaissance?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/with-steeltoe-1-1-the-net-microservices-party-rolls-on?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> With Steeltoe 1.1, the .NET Microservices Party Rolls On (Ep. 44) Zach Brown and Dave Tillman join Jeff and Dormain to dig into the details of the recently released Steeltoe 1.1. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/with-steeltoe-1-1-the-net-microservices-party-rolls-on?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/reacting-to-spring-framework-5-0?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Reacting to Spring Framework 5.0 Gain the freedom to choose the right stack for the right job with Spring Framework 5. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/reacting-to-spring-framework-5-0?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/corelogic?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Demystifying the Real Estate Business with Cloud-Native Software Learn why CoreLogic chose Pivotal Cloud Foundry to standardize its application development environment. Check it Out <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/corelogic?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.heavybit.com/library/podcasts/ep-12-keeping-cloud-foundry-secure/]]> Keeping Cloud Foundry Secure Molly Crowther, Senior Technical Program Manager at Pivotal, joins Guy Podjarny of The Secure Developer podcast to discuss her role in managing security for Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Listen In <[[https://www.heavybit.com/library/podcasts/ep-12-keeping-cloud-foundry-secure/]]> <[[http://engineering.pivotal.io/post/interpreting-decision-trees-and-random-forests/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Interpreting Decision Trees and Random Forests Greg Tam deep dives into the fundamentals of decision trees and random forests to better interpret them. Read Now <[[http://engineering.pivotal.io/post/interpreting-decision-trees-and-random-forests/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 9/28 Building Event-Driven Systems with Spring Cloud Stream, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-28-building-event-driven-systems-with-spring-cloud-stream-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/3 mimacom & Pivotal Cloud Foundry Workshop, Charlotte <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-Mimacom-PCF-Workshop-Charlotte.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/4 Getting Reactive with Spring Framework 5.0’s GA Release, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-4-getting-reactive-with-spring-framework-5-0-s-ga-release-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/11-10/12 Cloud Foundry Summit Europe, Basel <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/europe-2017/]]>
10/12 SpringOne Platform Preview, Toronto <[[https://toronto-springone-preview.cfapps.io/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
